bug.author: sile

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sile>@sile</denchmark-link> you need to install from pypi

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Borda>@Borda</denchmark-link> My problem was solved by installing . Thank you! BTW, I think that it's better to add to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/williamFalcon/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/requirements.txt>requirements.txt</denchmark-link> if the package is mandatory to import .

I am not sure about it, we had similar discussion some time ago and we decided that we don't want to forse users of mlflow (or other alternatives) to use test-tube so lightning can be installed without any of these dependencies and we leave the decision about preferable logger to the user... That's also why there is integration of the three main logging tools :)
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sile>@sile</denchmark-link> but I agree that the package should not crash just after importing ... I will have look at it, pls reopen this issue 8-)

Reopened.
we leave the decision about preferable logger to the user
Sounds good. Thank you for your explanation.
we need to submit a fix for test-tube
Fixed on master. we can drop the reqs for next release

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/williamFalcon>@williamFalcon</denchmark-link> so now <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/commit/e41bf0a047085037cb7e37d4c3cb95aab0e218f6>e41bf0a</denchmark-link> you force users to use ? I thought that we let them chose <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/issues/469#issuecomment-550593621>#469 (comment)</denchmark-link>
users should have a choice. iâ€™d like to not force it. but crash on install is not good UX. UX takes priority. once install works without crashing because of test-tube we can remove the requirement.
I know that is why I prepared a fix, but I agree that it can go in the next release...

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Borda>@Borda</denchmark-link> on second thought, i don't think we can get rid of test-tube logger as a dependency because we need a default logger when people use the trainer. A happy medium would be to implement a tensorboard logger using PyTorch SummaryWriter which would be the default logger.
